value: Desecration: Debasement or defilement of one sworn to an enemy order.
Desecration: Corruption of a place, object, ritual or tradition to appropriate its power.
Desecration: Defilement of a place, object or ritual to humiliate another order.
Desecration: Manipulation of authorities or institutions to appropriate their power.
Desecration: Corruption of acolytes to prepare them for transformation.
Desecration: Mindless, pointless chaos; sowing the seeds of anarchy.
